What is the default value of the second parameter in the `getrawtransaction` command?

The default value of the second parameter in the `getrawtransaction` command is not specified in the text. However, based on the example provided, it appears that the second parameter is optional and can be set to 1 to include additional information in the response.

nds since epoch (Jan 1 1970 GMT)
 "blocktime" : ttt     (numeric) The block time in seconds since epoch (Jan 1 1970 GMT)
}
```
Examples:
```bash
> verus getrawtransaction "mytxid"
> verus getrawtransaction "mytxid" 1
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getrawtransaction", "params": ["mytxid", 1] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```
